headline: CEO & Founder at jack & annie's and The Jackfruit Company
summary:
It’s not “plant-based” – it’s nature’s meatiest plant, jackfruit. 

Today The Jackfruit Company / jack & annie’s (2 brands, 1 company) operate the world’s leading jackfruit supply chain, R&D, and brands. 

When I began this incredible journey in 2011, we carried a whole jackfruit with us to every sales call – to prove we hadn’t made up this miracle crop no one had heard of. 

Over these years we’ve had the fortune of creating immense incremental income for thousands of small farmers we partner with in India. We’ve established an unparalleled global supply chain that, per our Life Cycle Assessment, delivers our jackfruit to the US with a 94% lower Global Warming Potential (comprehensive metric for carbon footprint) vs beef. We’ve won numerous awards for best-tasting and most innovative foods, including 5 NEXTY Awards and most recently a 2023 Libby Award. We’ve had the joy of working with retailers, restaurants, universities, and more, across the US and beyond, to get foods that satisfy like meat – though with much lower fat, and a good/excellent source of both protein and fiber – to people seeking these real (and really delicious) solutions.

As a first-time and solo founder/CEO (“jack” is *still* jackfruit), I’m far less naïve – but no less confident – today than >10 years ago, that we will change this world for the better. With deep gratitude for our customers, consumers, fans, team, farmers, partners, investors, and more – THANK YOU – we are well on our way.

experiences.title: CEO & Founder
experiences.description:
The leader in delicious & wholesome meat alternatives - made from jackfruit, nature's meatiest plant.

We’ve won numerous awards for best-tasting and most innovative foods, including 5 NEXTY Awards and most recently a 2023 Libby Award. Partnering with retailers, restaurants, universities, and more, across the US and beyond, we've gotten foods that satisfy like meat – though with much lower fat, and a good/excellent source of both protein and fiber – to millions of people who enjoy these real (and really delicious) solutions as much as we do. Since launch in 2020, jack & annie's has grown exponentially to become a top 5 brand in the Frozen Plant-Based category for multiple national retailers.

experiences.title: CEO & Founder
experiences.description:
When I began this journey in 2011, we carried a whole jackfruit with us to every sales call – to prove we hadn’t made up this incredible crop no one had heard of. Today The Jackfruit Company / jack & annie’s (2 brands, 1 company) operate the world’s leading jackfruit supply chain, R&D, and brands.

Over these years we’ve had the fortune of creating immense incremental income for thousands of small farmers we partner with in India. We’ve established an unparalleled global supply chain (in quality, cost, volume, scalability, reliability, & customization) that, per our Life Cycle Assessment, delivers our jackfruit to the US with a 94% lower Global Warming Potential (comprehensive metric for carbon footprint) vs beef.

experiences.title: Advisor
experiences.description: Rare is a leading non-profit in international conservation and climate change mitigation.

experiences.title: Unreasonable Fellow
experiences.description: Unreasonable is an organization, investment fund, and private global network dedicated to supporting entrepreneurs positioned to bend history in the right direction. Unreasonable's mission is to drive resources into and break down barriers for select companies leveraging profit to solve the seemingly intractable social and environmental challenges of our time.

experiences.title: Teaching Fellow & Entrepreneurship Tutor
experiences.description:
Teaching Fellow for College or cross-listed courses taught at HBS and HKS: Innovation and Entrepreneurship: American Experience in Comparative Perspective (USW-36); Philanthropy and Public Problem-Solving (SOC-152/MLD-805)
Entrepreneurship Tutor at Quincy House

experiences.title: Co-founder, Co-CEO, CSO
experiences.description:
Created & implemented system sending automated SMS reminders to >4,000 mothers, pregnant women, and community health workers in India for prenatal care checkups & infant vaccinations
2011 and 2012 US Finals, Microsoft's Imagine Cup; 2013 MassChallenge Finalist & 2013 Echoing Green Finalist
Created mobile gaming app to help kids in the US adhere to asthma therapy

experiences.title: Associate Director
experiences.description:
Team of 5 involved in purchasing, packing & distributing aid materials following the 2010 earthquake in Haiti. Installed water chlorination units and built latrines in the DR/Haiti border region.
Davis Projects for Peace Grant Winner; Created and directed Global Development Innovators Program

experiences.title: Principal Investigator - Medical Anthropology Research
experiences.description:
Conducted >80 interviews to understand how second-generation Hmong Americans - across Christian, Animist, and Shaman backgrounds - interact with the American healthcare system.  
Ethnic Studies Prize for honors thesis; Kenneth I. Juster Fellow; Williams/Lodge International Government and Public Affairs Research Fellow, Weatherhead Center

experiences.title: Honorary Legatum Fellow - Legatum Center for Development and Entrepreneurship
experiences.description: Various social entrepreneurship undertakings => Remindavax => The Jackfruit Company

experiences.title: Health Policy Analyst, Nicaragua Field Investigator - Multi-Country Study of Prevention of HIV MTCT
experiences.description: Conducted >80 interviews in Spanish to inform UNICEF and Nicaragua Ministry of Health policies and practices for prevention of mother-to-child transmission of HIV

education.field_of_study: Social Anthropology, Secondary Field: Global Health & Health Policy
education.description: Sophia Freund Prize, Ethnic Studies Senior Thesis Prize, Joseph Garrison Parker Prize, Bernie O'Keefe Award, Fulbright-Nehru Scholar (declined), Michael C Rockefeller Fellow (declined), Phi Beta Kappa, Junior 24, NEJM Gold Scholar, David Roux Global Health Fellowship, John Harvard Scholar, Detur Book Prize
education.grade: summa cum laude, Sophia Freund Prize (GPA 4.00)
education.activities_and_societies: Harvard Students for Global Health (Vice President of Programming), Tech in the World (Adviser), Harvard College Global Health Review (Managing Editor, Staff Writer), Big Sister Association of Greater Boston, Brattle Street Chamber Players
